short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Prevents you from using letters that are known to be incorrect.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An open-source extension that keeps you from playing a letter that you've already played that is not in the word.

When you type or click a letter, the extension will check if that letter has already been played and marked as not in the word. If it has the backspace key will be triggered removing the letter.

See the code at https://github.com/crbanman/wordle-hard-mode-helper
